mapper.select: SELECT articleNum, articleTitle, articleContent, articleAuthor, memberName, articleDate, IF(likeCount IS NULL, 0, likeCount) AS articleLike, IF(commentCount IS NULL, 0, commentCount) AS articleComments FROM articles A INNER JOIN members M ON A.articleAuthor = M.memberId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT likeArticle, COUNT(likeNum) AS likeCount FROM likes GROUP BY likeArticle ) L ON A.articleNum = L.likeArticle LEFT JOIN ( SELECT commentArticle, COUNT(commentNum) AS commentCount FROM comments GROUP BY commentArticle ) C ON A.articleNum = C.commentArticle ORDER BY articleNum DESC;

SELECT articleNum, articleTitle, articleContent, articleAuthor, memberName, articleDate, IF(likeCount IS NULL, 0, likeCount) AS articleLike FROM articles A INNER JOIN members M ON A.articleAuthor = M.memberId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT likeArticle, COUNT(likeNum) AS likeCount FROM likes GROUP BY likeArticle ) L ON A.articleNum = L.likeArticle WHERE articleNum = #{articleNum};

SELECT commentNum, commentContent, commentAuthor, memberName, commentDate, commentArticle FROM comments C INNER JOIN members M on C.commentAuthor = M.memberId WHERE commentArticle = #{articleNum} ORDER BY commentDate ASC
SELECT commentNum, commentContent, commentAuthor, memberName, commentDate, commentArticle FROM comments C INNER JOIN members M on C.commentAuthor = M.memberId WHERE commentNum = #{commentNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO articles(articleTitle, articleAuthor, articleContent) VALUES(#{articleTitle}, #{articleAuthor}, #{articleContent});
INSERT INTO comments(commentContent, commentAuthor, commentArticle) VALUES(#{commentContent}, #{commentAuthor}, #{commentArticle});
